text:
Berklee Online, online.berklee.edu, Boston, MA (local only at this time)

Senior PHP full-stack, serious SQL chops, Javascript MVC of some kind (we're using Ember, you should have seen something like it). Making our award winning online music education better with our combination of customized front-end experiences for students and teachers to share, and homegrown + open-source backend content management systems. lstevens@berklee.edu
